title: How do I access the Loot Menu
body:
How do I access the Loot Menu? have videos of people using it yet i can't even find the menu button to access it.
Please help.

replies.body:
?

If you are tlaking about the new "[crafting](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/site/2016-season-update/champion-mastery.html)" stuff it only just got added to PBE. Won't be on Live servers for while.
